import React from 'react'; import { Button, Typography, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material'; import EmailIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Email'; import BusinessIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Business'; import DescriptionIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Description'; import AssignmentIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Assignment'; import AdminPanelSettingsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AdminPanelSettings'; import SupervisorAccountIcon from '@mui/icons-material/SupervisorAccount'; import AccountBalanceIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AccountBalance'; // ‚úÖ Account icon function Dashboard({ onSelect }) { return (
Welcome to Alpha Dashboard
{/* üì¨ Mail App */} onSelect('mail')}> Mail App {/* üìÅ General Correspondence */} onSelect('general')}> General Correspondence {/* üè¢ Master Correspondence */} onSelect('master')}> Master Correspondence {/* üìù Client Form */} onSelect('form')}> Client Form {/* üìí Job Register */} onSelect('register')}> Job Register {/* üõ°Ô∏è Operation Head */} onSelect('operationHead')}> Operation Head {/* üßë‚Äçüíº Systems */} onSelect('supervisor')}> Systems {/* üßæ Accounts */} onSelect('accounts')}> Accounts
); } export default Dashboard;
